foreignData.name: Einfluss der Sterne
foreignData.text: Jeder Spieler mischt die Karten auf seiner Hand, in seinen Friedhof und die bleibenden Karten, die er besitzt, in seine Bibliothek und zieht dann sieben Karten. Der Lebenspunktestand jedes Spielers wird 7.

foreignData.name: Influencia de las estrellas
foreignData.text: Cada jugador baraja su mano, cementerio y permanentes que le pertenezcan en su biblioteca, luego roba siete cartas. El total de vidas de cada jugador es 7.

foreignData.name: Pouvoir des étoiles
foreignData.text: Chaque joueur mélange sa main, son cimetière et les permanents qu'il possède avec sa bibliothèque, et pioche ensuite sept cartes. Le total de points de vie de chaque joueur devient 7.

foreignData.name: Influenza delle Stelle
foreignData.text: Ogni giocatore rimescola la propria mano, il proprio cimitero e i permanenti che possiede nel proprio grimorio, quindi pesca sette carte. Il totale dei punti vita di ogni giocatore diventa 7.

foreignData.name: 星の揺らぎ
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーは、自分がオーナーである手札と墓地とパーマネントをライブラリーに加えて切り直し、その後カードを７枚引く。 各プレイヤーのライフの総量は７点になる。

foreignData.name: Oscilação das Estrelas
foreignData.text: Cada jogador embaralha sua própria mão, cemitério e as permanentes que lhe pertecem em seu próprio grimório e depois compra sete cards. O total de pontos de vida de cada jogador se torna 7.

foreignData.name: 物换星移
foreignData.text: 每位牌手将其手牌，坟墓场，以及自己所拥有的永久物洗入其牌库，然后各抓七张牌。 每位牌手的总生命成为7。

name: Sway of the Stars
originalText: Each player shuffles his or her hand, graveyard, and permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total becomes 7.

rulings.text: Changes in life total are treated as life gain and life loss.
Tokens are included in the effect but shouldn’t actually be included in the shuffle. Tokens will cease to exist immediately after the spell resolves.
This card won’t be put into your graveyard until after it’s finished resolving, which means it won’t be shuffled into your library as part of its own effect.

text: Each player shuffles their hand, graveyard, and all permanents they own into their library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total becomes 7.
